articles.content: FeatureThey're hoping this won't be their last global event together, but Boult's decision to step away from his NZC contract could complicate the issue

articles.title: T20 WC 2022: Marcus Stoinis and the 'feel' factor | Australia vs England | Cricbuzz.com - Cricbuzz
articles.description: His knock against Sri Lanka made the dressing room and home crowds believe again. Australia will need some more of that from Stoinis against England
articles.content: Marcus Stoinis is a 'feel' player. Even if it might not be in keeping with the various machismo-oozing monikers that get brandished around for him, from the Hulk to the Big Rig and even The Predator.… [+4521 chars]
